00023 // If this macro is defined, we use a Text output
00024 // otherwise, a terminal output is used
00025 #define TEXT_OUTPUT

00039 #ifdef TEXT_OUTPUT
00040 #  include <cppunit/TextTestRunner.h>
00044 int main(int argc, char* argv[]){
00045 
00046   RainbruRPG::Exception::Logger::getSingleton()
00047     .setLogType(RainbruRPG::Exception::LOG_FILE);
00048 
00049   CPPUNIT_NS::TextTestRunner runner;
00050   
00051   CPPUNIT_NS::TestSuite suite("RPG");
00052   initRPGSuite(&suite);
00053   
00054   runner.addTest(&suite);
00055   
00056   runner.run("", false, true, true);
00057   return 0;
00058 }
00059 
00060 #else
00061 #  include <cppunit/ui/qt/TestRunner.h>
00062 #  include <qapplication.h>
00071 int main(int argc, char* argv[]){
00072 
00073   QApplication app(argc, argv);
00074   CPPUNIT_NS::QtTestRunner runner;
00075   
00076   CPPUNIT_NS::TestSuite suite("RPG");
00077   initRPGSuite(&suite);
00078   runner.addTest(&suite);
00079   
00080   runner.run(true);
00081   return 0;
00082 }

00092 void initRPGSuite(CPPUNIT_NS::TestSuite* r){
00093   r->addTest( new tapiTestSuite() );
00094   r->addTest( new CommonTestSuite() );
00095 }
